name: Mama Addons for Elementor Page Builder
author: codenpy

sections.description:
Supercharge your Elementor Page Builder with 15+ professional widgets and add-ons that will give you the ability to build modern stunning websites in less time with no coding required. Both Elementor and Premium Addons plugins take your WordPress website to the next level.

Live Demo

Widgets List

  • Hero Banner
  • About Us
  • Contact Details
  • Call to Action
  • Fancy Box
  • Feature Lists
  • Icon Box
  • Image Box
  • Info Card
  • Interactive Card
  • Line Chart
  • Pricing Table
  • Review
  • Road Map
  • Round Chart

Features

  • Highly Customizabale
  • 100% Responsive all elements
  • Super easy Installation.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Easy user interface.
  • Works with any theme.
  • All Major browser supported.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or upload the .zip file with the plugin under Plugins > Add New > Upload.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. You can find Premium Addons Elements under the category **MAMA WIDGETS on your Elementor element/widget list.
